snippet: The mayor, Michael Applebaum, denied that he was guilty of any of the 14 charges he now faces, but he said it would not be possible to act as mayor while defending himself.
lead_paragraph: The mayor, Michael Applebaum, denied that he was guilty of any of the 14 charges he now faces, but he said it would not be possible to act as mayor while defending himself.

headline.main: Montreal Mayor Resigns After Bribery Arrest
headline.print_headline: Canada: Montreal Mayor Resigns After Bribery Arrest
